description:
Keep the ears warm! The Ella is a wide headband with hand-embroidered fern design contrasted with a moss stitch knit pattern. The headband is 11cm tall and has an inner fleece headband for extra warmth.

  • Made with 100% wool
  • Fleece headband lining for added comfort & warmth
  • Handmade in Nepal
name: Ambler Ella Headband - Women's
